custom_params.label: DNS
custom_params.tooltip: Crowd density - how many voices in the murmur

custom_params.label: DST
custom_params.tooltip: Distance from crowd - near whispers to far roar

custom_params.label: MOD
custom_params.tooltip: Emotional tone - relaxed to excited chatter

custom_params.label: MVT
custom_params.tooltip: Crowd movement - still gathering to bustling

custom_params.label: SPC
custom_params.tooltip: Open air ambience - park acoustic width
